All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
FirestoreManager
Manages an instance of the Firestore Database, providing access to the various collections.
Item
Item is a single item data type, it is a serializable data type
ItemDisplayFragment
 
ItemFirestoreAdapter
RecyclerView Adapter
ItemListController
A controller class for the ItemListFragment, managing the ItemFirestoreAdapter with queries and filtering.
ItemListFragment
A Fragment that displays a RecyclerView that contains a list of Item, Displays the total value of the items currently displayed.
ItemSet
Data Collection representing a collection of Item, that can calculate the total value of the items in the set.
ItemViewHolder
ViewHolder for Item that binds the data to a view for ItemFirestoreAdapter
MainActivity
Main activity for the app, contains a NavHostFragment to display the various fragments of the app
ProfilePageFragment
 
SelectListener
SelectListener is an interface that is used to implement UI interactions for views that are not visible to the current class.
Tag
A tag consists of a name, and a color.
User
This data type is for the user, which contains an username and an email.
